title: go-bootstrap build failure in Centos 7
body:
The error
```
==> Staging archive: spack/var/spack/stage/go-bootstrap-1.4-bootstrap-20161024-j7p5gfmaldbmlrbial3te2jaafz3qfla/go1.4-bootstrap-20161024.tar.gz
==> Created stage in spack/var/spack/stage/go-bootstrap-1.4-bootstrap-20161024-j7p5gfmaldbmlrbial3te2jaafz3qfla
==> Ran patch() for go-bootstrap
==> Building go-bootstrap [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/bin/bash' 'all.bash'
spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/go-bootstrap/package.py:78, in install:
     74       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     75           env['CGO_ENABLED'] = '0'
     76           bash = which('bash')
     77           with working_dir('src'):
  >> 78               bash('{0}.bash'.format('all' if '+test' in spec else 'make'))
     79
     80           try:
     81               os.makedirs(prefix)
     82           except OSError:
     83               pass
     84           for f in glob.glob('*'):
     85               if os.path.isdir(f):
     86                   shutil.copytree(f, os.path.join(prefix, f))
     87               else:
     88                   shutil.copy2(f, os.path.join(prefix, f))

See build log for details:
  /tmp/spack-stage/spack-stage-1fOnnB/go/spack-build.out
```

spack-build.out
```
...
ok      testing/quick   0.035s
ok      text/scanner    0.010s
ok      text/tabwriter  0.008s
ok      text/template   0.037s
ok      text/template/parse     0.013s
--- FAIL: TestParseInLocation (0.00s)
        format_test.go:202: ParseInLocation(Feb 01 2013 AST, Baghdad) = 2013-02-01 00:00:00 +0000 AST, want 2013-02-01 00:00:00 +0300 +03
FAIL
FAIL    time    2.395s
ok      unicode 0.016s
ok      unicode/utf16   0.004s
```

Related issue: https://github.com/golang/go/issues/19457
